header.title: megaco_codec_meas

erlref.modulesummary: This module implements a simple megaco codec measurement tool.

description.p: This module implements a simple megaco codec measurement tool.
Results are written to file (excel compatible text files) and on stdout.
Note that this module is not included in the runtime part of the application.

desc.p: This function runs the measurement on all the official codecs; pretty, compact, ber, per and erlang.
